<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 16"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Instrument of Slaughter](/Feats.aspx?ID=1691) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 121 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Prerequisites**
[divine ally (blade)](/Classes.aspx?ID=4); [tenets of evil](/Tenets.aspx?ID=2)

</column>

---

Your blade ally thirsts for the blood of your foes. Whenever you critically hit an enemy with the weapon inhabited by your blade ally while dealing extra damage from your champion's reaction, the target takes [persistent bleed damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) equal to two of the weapon's damage dice.
name: Instrument of Slaughter
